item.title: Designing RESTful APIs for cloud services
item.description: Much has been written about basic REST API design, but most guides stop short of providing higher-level recommendations. This post proposes and motivates a set of guidelines for RESTful APIs (and by extension their contracts) intended to maximize their life span and support rapid evolution throughout it.
